page_content: The action plan for managing biodiversity  in Bristol is in the following document: (Bristol biodiversity action plan)[https://www.bristol.gov.uk/documents/20182/35052/BBAP.pdf/9074afdf-8f21-4296-b457-bc50830f0efc]. This is meant to provide a framework for habitat and species conservation in Bristol. Also see [Bristol parks & green space strategy](https://www.bristol.gov.uk/documents/20182/34780/Parks%20and%20Green%20Space%20Strategy%20-%20adopted%20Feb%202008_0_0_0_0_0_0.pdf/6bb2635a-ac11-4f22-b6fd-5b708b329940).
